data.title: Aegis Living
data.meta_description: At Aegis, we are committed to attracting the most compassionate, professional, and attentive employees. Learn about the benefits of working for Aegis Living.
data.text:
Working at Aegis Living makes you part of something bigger. Each employee is a part of our family that cares for a special group of people—our residents. It’s an opportunity to grow personally and professionally and find fulfillment each and every day alongside colleagues who become quick friends. You’re not just an employee; you’re a part of the Aegis Living community that celebrates and looks after every team member.

As an employee of Aegis Living Shadowridge for the past 3.5 years, I can testify to the fact that the company offers great incentives and excellent advancement opportunities. I feel supported by our corporate office, the General Manager, and my fellow team members. I feel incredibly...

As an employee of Aegis Living Shadowridge for the past 3.5 years, I can testify to the fact that the company offers great incentives and excellent advancement opportunities. I feel supported by our corporate office, the General Manager, and my fellow team members. I feel incredibly lucky to have found my dream job and I’m honored to share in the everyday moments of our residents and families. I look forward to continued growth in my career with Aegis.

I love my job. To be honest it is one of the best I have had and I would not change it for the world. The people are friendly and it is an experience that is unimaginable, unforgettable, and the best.

I love my job. To be honest it is one of the best I have had and I would not change it for the world. The people are friendly and it is an experience that is unimaginable, unforgettable, and the best.

I joined Aegis as a GM after working 25 years in ‘traditional’ hospitality. Love how the traits are transferable. Was looking for a ‘great’ company and found that in Aegis. I am humbled daily with how much purpose I find in my role. Caring for people is a privilege that...

I joined Aegis as a GM after working 25 years in ‘traditional’ hospitality. Love how the traits are transferable. Was looking for a ‘great’ company and found that in Aegis. I am humbled daily with how much purpose I find in my role. Caring for people is a privilege that not everyone gets to experience, I feel fortunate I am allowed to be part of our residents lives in a meaningful way.

Every day of bringing joy to residents, families, and team members is meaningful and fulfilling. Aegis is the best company to work with. The culture is second to none and they go above and beyond for the team members. They walk the talk by promoting from within, team member events,...

Every day of bringing joy to residents, families, and team members is meaningful and fulfilling. Aegis is the best company to work with. The culture is second to none and they go above and beyond for the team members. They walk the talk by promoting from within, team member events, free food, a lot of recognition, and many other symbols of gratitude.

I feel blessed to be able to work for such an amazing company... Our management and team of directors are wonderful to work with. It’s nice to wake up in the morning and look forward to going to work.

I feel blessed to be able to work for such an amazing company... Our management and team of directors are wonderful to work with. It’s nice to wake up in the morning and look forward to going to work.

I love working here. I was promoted in three months from maintenance assistant to director. If you put your head down and work, they will recognize and promote [you].

I love working here. I was promoted in three months from maintenance assistant to director. If you put your head down and work, they will recognize and promote [you].

If you are a culinary professional and want REAL work-life balance, I strongly recommend applying to Aegis Living. I worked myself to death in restaurants, hotels, and resorts until I moved back to Washington, and a buddy I worked with before was at Aegis and convinced me to come...

If you are a culinary professional and want REAL work-life balance, I strongly recommend applying to Aegis Living. I worked myself to death in restaurants, hotels, and resorts until I moved back to Washington, and a buddy I worked with before was at Aegis and convinced me to come work with him in a retirement setting... That was seven years ago and I do not regret a single thing. This is the most rewarding job in hospitality! Aegis is the best company in senior living! Great pay, career advancement, great benefits, work-life balance, and lots of fun with residents!
